en: Deliver me, O Jehovah, from the evil man; Preserve me from the violent man:
hmr: Aw LALPA, mi suola inthawk chun mi sanhim la, Mi nunrâwnga inthawk chun mi humhim rawh.

en: Who devise mischiefs in their heart; Continually do they gather themselves together for war.
hmr: Anni chun an lungrilah thil suk- suolhai an ngaituo hlak a, Do dingin an inkhâwm rawp hlak.

en: They have sharpened their tongue like a serpent; Adders’ poison is under their lips. [Selah
hmr: An lei chu rûl angin an suk- ngei a, An hner sûnga chun rûlriel tûr a um a.

en: Keep me, O Jehovah, from the hands of the wicked; Preserve me from the violent man: Who have purposed to thrust aside my steps.
hmr: Aw LALPA, mi rilo kuta in- thawk chun mi vawng ṭha la, Mi nunrâwnga inthawk chun mi humhim rawh; Anni chun ka ke pênhai hi nam kâwi an tum a.

en: The proud have hid a snare for me, and cords; They have spread a net by the wayside; They have set gins for me. [Selah
hmr: Mi chapohai chun ka âwkna dingin châng an kam rûk a, hruihruolhai leh; Lampui sîra chun lên an phah a, Ka âwkna dingin chânghai an kam a.

en: I said unto Jehovah, Thou art my God: Give ear unto the voice of my supplications, O Jehovah.
hmr: LALPA kuoma chun, “Nang chu ka Pathien i na, Aw LALPA, lunginsiet ka hnina râwlhai hi lo ngaisak rawh.

en: O Jehovah the Lord, the strength of my salvation, Thou hast covered my head in the day of battle.
hmr: Aw LALPA ka Pathien, ka san- damtu hrât, Nang chun indo nia chun ka lu i mîn khumpêk a;

en: Grant not, O Jehovah, the desires of the wicked; Further not his evil device, lest they exalt themselves. [Selah
hmr: Aw LALPA, mi rilo dit zâwng- hai chu phal naw la, An ngaituona suol chu inpui- tlingtir naw rawh; Chuong naw chun inchawimawi rawi an tih,” ka tih a.

en: As for the head of those that compass me about, Let the mischief of their own lips cover them.
hmr: A mîn huolvêltuhai lu chu, Anni hmûra an thu suol hril chun inkhum raw se.

en: Let burning coals fall upon them: Let them be cast into the fire, Into deep pits, whence they shall not rise.
hmr: Meilinghai an chungah tla sienla, Meia peiin um hai sienla, An tho nâwk ta nawna dingin khur inthûktakah peiin um raw se.

en: An evil speaker shall not be established in the earth: Evil shall hunt the violent man to overthrow him.
hmr: Thu ṭha naw hriltu chu hnuoia hin sukdetin um naw nih a, Mi nunrâwng sukse dingin thil ṭha nawin tlâkbuok a tih.

en: I know that Jehovah will maintain the cause of the afflicted, And justice for the needy.
hmr: LALPA chun rinum tuorhai chu an thuah ṭan a tih ti ka hriet, Pasiehai chu an ta dinga âwm hrima leh.

en: Surely the righteous shall give thanks unto thy name: The upright shall dwell in thy presence.
hmr: Matheiloin mi felhai chun i hming inpâk an ta, Mi indikhai chu i hmaah um an tih.
